description: Sunlit reefs and balmy tides: a soundtrack for snorkeling Phuket across its seasonal moods.

items.name: Ya Nui Beach
items.description: The Ya Nui beach is tiny but it has many attractions. This place is tucked in a cove between the two places in Phuket which makes it a great option for snorkeling in Phuket Thailand. It lies between the Windmill viewpoint and Promthep cape that is located in the south of Phuket Island. The place looks like a secret beach but in reality, it has many crowds attracted to it. The place is suggestively good for snorkeling so people enjoy doing snorkeling on the Ya Nui beach.
items.location_hint: Rawai, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket, Thailand Thailand

items.name: Laem Singh Beach
items.description: Laem Singh Beach is also one of the major tourist attractions and so this place is very lively and full of people. There are many restaurants and many other water sports used to take place on this beach. There is a heavy crowd of people for snorkeling as well. However, in the past two years, there are some conflicts related to this beach so it has started to stay quiet and less crowded. But the place is one of the destinations for best snorkeling in Phuket.

items.name: Kata Beach
items.location_hint: Karon, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

items.name: Similan Island
items.location_hint: Lam Kaen, Thai Mueang District, Phang-nga, Thailand

items.name: Racha Island
items.location_hint: Rawai, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket, Thailand

items.name: Rang Yai Island
items.location_hint: Rang Yai Island, Phuket District, Phuket, Thailand

items.name: Koh Khai
items.description: There are 3 small but very beautiful islands present on the eastern coast of Phuket Island that is known as the Koh Khai which are some of the great places for snorkeling in Phuket Thailand. All three islands are connected and are very closely situated. You can even walk from one island to another. People love to soak themselves in the clear water of the island and enjoy swimming as well as snorkeling over there.
items.location_hint: Phru Nai, Ko Yao District, Phang-nga, Thailand

items.name: Maiton Island
items.location_hint: 100 Vichit Maung, Chalong, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand
